title: Introduction to horizontal jumping: long jump - triple jump
creator_credit: Ron Taylor and Department of Education, Queensland
brief_description: Provides an introduction to horizontal jumping. Shows flexibility and warm-up exercises and gives comprehensive information on run-up, take-off, flight and landing techniques.
